basics.name: Maxime Rouiller
basics.label: Solutions Architect/CEO at Solutions Novaweb
basics.summary:
Maxime Rouiller is a passionate .NET technology specialist, working for 10 years in large software development, advocating Agile and TDD. Aware of the latest technological trends, he intervenes as a specialist in the .NET Montréal usergroup and acts regularly as a speaker for Web Form programmers on the MVC platform as well as for promoting testing practices. 

Specialties: Testing, ASP.NET MVC 4, ASP.NET 4.0, .NET 4.0,  jQuery, HTML5, Javascript, WCF, Build/test automation

work.summary:
Independent consultant. 

Provide software development services for the client. 

Cirque du Soleil - February 2015 to now
* Manage Azure Cloud services
* Maintain homemade application framework for Cloud Development
* Create provisioning scenario with Azure Resource Manager Templates
* Requirement acquisition from client
* Write documentation for deployment on Azure
* Write deployment Powershell scripts for Azure
* Rewrite logic for internal WiFi application
* Technology positioning and strategy

Technologies: 
* ASP.NET MVC, Durandal, Windows Azure (WebApps, Service Bus, Storage, etc), ReSharper, OData, REST, ADFS, Powershell

GARDA - July 2014 to January 2015
* Maintain existing application                                            
* Create monthly sales report for the sales director                       
* Participate in the architecture of the new version of the internal tools 
* Reviewed the cloud architecture for the new version of the internal tools
* Participate in different agile meeting (SCRUM)                           
* Requirement acquisition for different softwares

Technologies
* ASP.NET MVC, WebApi, Azure, C#, Git, ReSharper, AngularJS, Bootstrap, OData

RADIO-CANADA (Plateforme) - March 2014 to June 2014
* Help in the development of internal tools for content management/distribution
* Architecture and database review
* Review code to be shipped
* Participate in different agile meeting

Technologies
  * ASP.NET MVC 5, WebAPI, C#, TFS, ReSharper, Durandal, RequireJS, jQuery

RADIO-CANADA (Tou.Tv) - October 2013 to March 2014
* Help in the development of their online streaming platform.
* Implemented SSO for their platform
* Provide suggestions on architecture and code.
* Review code to be shipped
* Took the lead in obtaining requirements from different departments.
* Provided real-time error analysis of the system

Technologies
  * ASP.NET MVC 5, WebAPI, C#, TFS, ReSharper, Durandal, RequireJS, jQuery, ElasticSearch, Kibana

Maintained a product in ASP.NET
Participated in a rewrite of the project with XAML, C# and the company's proprietary framework

-Build ASP.NET websites based on specification
-Brought under test a legacy application that wasn't initially tested.
-Wrote automated unit test, UI test as well as integration tests.
-Evaluate tasks to plan iterations
-Coach other developers on new technology
-External client consulting


Technologies:
-C#
-ASP.NET MVC 2, MVC 3, MVC 4
-HTML5
-jQuery + KnockoutJS
-ASP.NET Web API
-StructureMap/Ninject

Build websites for clients
Gave jQuery, TDD, MVC formations internally
Went to do formations at clients
